title: New: Space Cubs – Why Are You Resisting? (You Know You're From There)
body:
Photo: [Courtney Denk](http://godsgreenhair.tumblr.com/)

Well this is rather special. Buffalo’s **Space Cubs** aka Suzanne Bonifacio released a trio of tracks throughout last year, all glitchy, slightly lo-fi freak-pop jaunts, thriving upon their raw production elements, and her unique vocals. Now, six months down the line and Bonifacio is back with a double AA single of sorts, the stunning _Why Are You Resisting? (You Know You’re From There)_ and the equally as complex _Midtime Disguise_. Opening as a rather unsettling, Bjork meets Grimes, atmospheric number, _Why Are You_… then blossoms elegantly into a wonderfully self-assured, dream-pop gem, complete with a vaguely XX drum section (wait for 2.30ish… trust me).

‘_You, you held your calm, while I was on the line, all dishevelled, just like yesterday’_

Check out _Why Are You Resisting? (You Know You’re From There) _below, and if that floats your boat, then try out _Midtime Disguise_ underneath that.
